text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM xmlns=\"urn:bookadvert:18thcentury\"><HEADLINE>In denen Thurneysischen Buchl\u0007den allhier</HEADLINE><BIBLIOGRAPHY><ENTRY><TITLE>Dictionnaire Universel Francois & Latin, Vulgairement appell\t Dictionaire de Trevoux</TITLE><SUBTITLE>avec des Remarques d Erudition & de Critique</SUBTITLE><VOLUME>5. Tom.</VOLUME><FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT><YEAR>1741</YEAR><NOTE>davon die 3. ersten Tom. dato schon zu beziehen sind; das gantze Werck kostet samt der Fracht</NOTE><PRICE><CURRENCY>fl.</CURRENCY><AMOUNT>24</AMOUNT></PRICE></ENTRY><ENTRY><TITLE>Dictionaire Oeconomique, continant les moyens d'Augmenter son dien & de conserver sa sante</TITLE><AUTHOR>Mister Noel Chomel</AUTHOR><AUTHOR>F. parsed.explanation:
1. Added root-level structure with proper XML namespace declaration.
2. Wrapped the entire content in an <ITEM> tag with proper structure.
3. Added <HEADLINE> tag for the introductory text.
4. Created a <BIBLIOGRAPHY> section with <ENTRY> tags for each bibliography entry.
5. Separated <TITLE> and <SUBTITLE> tags for clarity.
6. Added <AUTHOR> tags for each author.
7. Added <NOTE> tags for additional descriptive notes.
8. Fixed duplicate <FORMAT> tag for the second bibliography entry.
9. Corrected <PRICE> tags to include <CURRENCY> and <AMOUNT> sub-tags.
10. Added <SUBCURRENCY> and <UNIT> tags for fractional currency and units.
11. Corrected the spelling of 'Gotofredi' in the title.
12. Added <ADDITIONAL_INFO> section for items mentioned after the main bibliography.
13. Fixed formatting issues with special characters (e.g., 	 for tab,  for bell).
14. Ensured consistent tag structure and hierarchy.
15. Added proper closing tags for all elements.
